statements: SELECT * FROM painting_tutorials ORDER BY tutorial_title ASC;
SELECT tutorial_title, skill_level FROM painting_tutorials WHERE skill_level = 'Advanced';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS num_tutorials FROM painting_tutorials;
SELECT tutorial_title FROM painting_tutorials WHERE technique = 'Watercolor' ORDER BY tutorial_id DESC;
SELECT tutorial_title, technique FROM painting_tutorials WHERE skill_level = 'Beginner' AND technique = 'Acrylic';
SELECT * FROM painting_tutorials WHERE skill_level = 'Beginner' ORDER BY tutorial_id DESC;
SELECT tutorial_title, technique FROM painting_tutorials WHERE skill_level = 'Intermediate';
SELECT tutorial_title, skill_level FROM painting_tutorials WHERE technique = 'Watercolor' ORDER BY tutorial_id ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT skill_level FROM painting_tutorials;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_tutorials FROM painting_tutorials WHERE technique = 'Acrylic';
SELECT * FROM tutorials WHERE skill_level = 'Beginner';
SELECT title, technique FROM tutorials WHERE skill_level = 'Intermediate';
SELECT title, skill_level FROM tutorials WHERE technique = 'SQL';
SELECT * FROM tutorials ORDER BY title DESC;
SELECT title, technique FROM tutorials WHERE tutorial_id > 5;
SELECT * FROM tutorials WHERE skill_level = 'Intermediate' ORDER BY title DESC;
SELECT tutorial_id, title FROM tutorials WHERE technique = 'SQL' ORDER BY tutorial_id;
SELECT title, technique FROM tutorials WHERE skill_level = 'Advanced' AND technique != 'Python' ORDER BY technique ASC, title ASC;
SELECT title, skill_level FROM tutorials WHERE title LIKE '%SQL%' ORDER BY skill_level ASC;
SELECT category_name, COUNT(tutorial_id) AS total_tutorials FROM tutorials JOIN categories ON tutorials.tutorial_id = categories.category_id GROUP BY category_name ORDER BY total_tutorials DESC;
SELECT * FROM tutorials;
SELECT title, description FROM tutorials WHERE skill_level='Advanced';
SELECT title, skill_level FROM tutorials ORDER BY tutorial_id DESC;
SELECT category_name FROM categories WHERE category_id=1;
SELECT tutorial_id, technique_name FROM techniques ORDER BY technique_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM tutorials;
SELECT title, description FROM tutorials WHERE skill_level = 'Advanced';
SELECT tutorial_id, title, skill_level FROM tutorials WHERE skill_level IN ('Beginner', 'Intermediate');
SELECT tutorial_id, title, description, skill_level FROM tutorials ORDER BY skill_level DESC;
SELECT t.title, c.category_name FROM tutorials t JOIN techniques tech ON t.tutorial_id = tech.tutorial_id JOIN categories c ON c.category_id = tech.technique_id;
SELECT * FROM tutorials;
SELECT title, skill_level FROM tutorials ORDER BY skill_level DESC;
SELECT title, technique FROM tutorials WHERE skill_level='Beginner';
SELECT name, bio FROM authors WHERE name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM tutorial_category WHERE category_id=1;
SELECT * FROM tutorials;
SELECT title, skill_level FROM tutorials WHERE skill_level = 'Intermediate';

SELECT tutorials.title, categories.name FROM tutorials JOIN tutorial_category ON tutorials.tutorial_id = tutorial_category.tutorial_id JOIN categories ON categories.category_id = tutorial_category.category_id WHERE categories.name = 'SQL';
SELECT authors.name, tutorials.title FROM authors JOIN tutorials ON authors.author_id = tutorials.tutorial_id;

SELECT tutorials.title, tutorials.technique, categories.name FROM tutorials JOIN tutorial_category ON tutorials.tutorial_id = tutorial_category.tutorial_id JOIN categories ON categories.category_id = tutorial_category.category_id;
SELECT * FROM tutorials;
SELECT title, skill_level FROM tutorials WHERE skill_level = 'Beginner';
SELECT title, technique FROM tutorials WHERE technique = 'Indexing';
SELECT title, skill_level, technique FROM tutorials WHERE skill_level = 'Intermediate' AND technique = 'Sorting';
SELECT id, title, skill_level FROM tutorials ORDER BY skill_level DESC, title ASC;
SELECT id, title FROM tutorials;
SELECT * FROM tutorials WHERE skill_level = 'Beginner';
SELECT title, technique FROM tutorials WHERE skill_level = 'Intermediate' ORDER BY title ASC;

SELECT t.title, s.level_name, te.technique_name FROM tutorials t JOIN tutorial_skill_levels tsl ON t.id = tsl.tutorial_id JOIN skill_levels s ON tsl.level_id = s.id JOIN tutorial_techniques tt ON t.id = tt.tutorial_id JOIN techniques te ON tt.technique_id = te.id;
SELECT * FROM tutorials WHERE title LIKE '%Python%' AND technique NOT IN (SELECT technique_name FROM techniques WHERE technique_name = 'SQL');
